content.raw: I think this was due to the reader instance created during `prebuild_byte_offset_file` not being explicitly closed and when a garbage collection happens might happen. By explicitly closing (using a with statement) the instance in that method after the index is built, the test seems to have stopped warning about a leaked file.
content.html: I think this was due to the reader instance created during prebuild_byte_offset_file not being explicitly closed and when a garbage collection happens might happen. By explicitly closing (using a with statement) the instance in that method after the index is built, the test seems to have stopped warning about a leaked file.
